# Description
This module creates a view to display source code with syntax highlighting. 

# Usage in "structure"
Example:

	 {
	   "layout": {
	      ...
	      "rows": [
	      {
	        "rowId": "123",
	        "resourceURL": "src/code",
	        "title":"Source View",
	        "type": "pong-sourcecode",
	        "moduleConfig":{ "type":"javascript" }
	      },
	      ...
	    ],
	    ...
	 }
